text: John Alexander 'Alex' McMillan III (born May 9, 1932) is an American Republican politician . McMillan was born in Charlotte, North Carolina. He was a five term member in the U.S. House of Representatives, representing North Carolina's 9th congressional district from 1985 to 1995. ==Other websites== *J. Alex McMillan Papers, Southern Historical Collection, UNC-Chapel Hill * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Politicians from Charlotte, North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Alex McMillan
